sourcesContent:
lista-itens works!

{{item}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-lista-itens', templateUrl: './lista-itens.component.html', styleUrls: ['./lista-itens.component.css'] }) export class ListaItensComponent { item: string = ''; itens: string[] = []; AdicionarItem() { this.itens.push(this.item); this.item = '' } }
